game.miscDetails: This game works exactly like crazy climber except you can shoot by pressing right on the left joystick and left on the right joystick at the same time. Some conversion kits used top-fire joysticks as this is a rather un-natural movement for firing rapidly. Because of this an auxillary input for 'fire' is included. So you can play this game with two joysticks, a joystick and a top-fire, two top-fires or whatever floats your boat.
